title: Calculating Differences Scanning Files
body: Everytime I update my client, the day after, it always gets the "calculating differences" error and scans files forever, and I always have to go into my League of Legends folder and delete a bunch of files and I have to wait another 2 hours to fix the problem and rescan all the files. Why is this happening to my laptop, and is there any way to fix it? Thanks

replies.body:
Issues during the patching process can be caused by a number of factors, it really depends on at what % the failure happens. We have a consolidated list of general fixes for this in our [Patching Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues), so I recommend going through those.

Let me know if those steps resolved your issue.
